title: ‘No terror conspiracy or outside interference’ behind Nowgam blast: J-K Lt Governor Manoj Sinha
text:
The L-G said that the sampling process had been going on at the police station for the past two days.

Jammu and Kashmir Lt Governor Manoj Sinha on Sunday ruled out any terror conspiracy in Friday night’s blast at Nowgam police station and announced a magisterial inquiry into the matter.

“The Nowgam police station incident was only an unfortunate accident and there was no terror conspiracy or outside interference behind it,” Sinha said while addressing a ‘Nagar Kirtan’ organised to commemorate the 350th martyrdom anniversary of Guru Tegh Bahadur at a gurdwara in Jammu.
